title: A vision concerning the mischievous seperation [sic] among Friends in Old England
author: Keith, George, 1639?-1716.
publisher: Printed and sold by Will. Bradford,
notes: "Collected and arranged under this false title by George Keith, for an evil purpose, to pass off as George Fox's."--Smith, J. Friends' books, v. 2, 26.
"A general epistle against separation" [p. 5] has caption title.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
